body:
We are organising training mornings on the first Sunday of each month.  The training is open to potential, new, and existing members.

Whether you’re completely new to the sport or looking to get back on the water our training sessions are the perfect way to gather new skills.

If you would like to get out on the water please register for one of the  sessions.



**[C﻿lick here for more details](https://sssc.myclubhouse.co.uk/Events/Calendar/ViewSeries?id=696)**



If you enjoy your first session, why not join?  We always welcome new members to the club, and are running  monthly  coaching sessions throughout the season.
